locations.name: Cave Entrance
locations.description: A foreboding entrance carved into the side of a cliff. Ancient runes flicker with a faint blue glow around the archway. A cool breeze carrying whispers emanates from within.

npcs.name: Old Miner
npcs.description: A grizzled dwarf with a long gray beard, warning adventurers about the dangers within.

plotHooks: Ancient runes hint at a forgotten history
Whispers from within beckon the curious

features.name: Glowing Runes
features.description: Ancient symbols carved around the entrance, pulsing with a faint blue light.

dcChecks.description: Decipher the meaning of the glowing runes

locations.name: Echoing Tunnels
locations.description: A network of winding passages where every sound echoes ominously. Shadows dance on the walls, cast by bioluminescent fungi.
plotHooks: Whispering echoes seem to form coherent messages
Strange shadows move independently

traps.name: Collapsing Floor
traps.description: A section of the floor that gives way under too much weight

features.name: Echo Chamber
features.description: A circular room where whispers are amplified to intelligible levels

dcChecks.description: Notice the subtle movements of unnatural shadows

locations.name: Fungal Grotto
locations.description: A vast cavern filled with an array of colorful, oversized fungi. The air is thick with spores, and the ground is soft and spongy.

npcs.name: Spore Druid
npcs.description: A human druid covered in symbiotic fungi, studying the unique ecosystem

plotHooks: The fungal network seems to possess a collective intelligence
Rare and powerful mushrooms grow in the center of the grotto

traps.name: Spore Cloud
traps.description: A pocket of highly concentrated spores that induce hallucinations
traps.damage: No damage, but causes the poisoned condition for 1d4 hours

features.name: Mycelium Network
features.description: A complex network of fungal threads that react to movement and vibrations

dcChecks.description: Identify safe paths through the fungal growth

locations.name: Underground River
locations.description: A swift, dark river cutting through the cave. The roar of unseen waterfalls echoes in the distance. Slick rocks line the shores.
plotHooks: An underwater passage might lead to hidden chambers
Strange glowing objects can be seen beneath the water's surface

features.name: Bioluminescent Pool
features.description: A calm pool off the main river, filled with glowing microorganisms

locations.name: Crystal Cavern
locations.description: A breathtaking chamber filled with massive crystal formations in various colors. The crystals softly hum and resonate with magical energy.
plotHooks: The crystal formations seem to form a complex magical circuit
Whispers can be heard emanating from certain crystals

traps.name: Crystal Surge
traps.description: Crystals suddenly grow rapidly, potentially encasing creatures

features.name: Harmonic Crystal
features.description: A large crystal that resonates with a specific frequency, causing various magical effects

dcChecks.description: Understand the magical properties of the crystal formations

locations.name: Unstable Passage
locations.description: A narrow, winding passage with unstable walls and ceiling. Occasional tremors send small rocks falling from above.
plotHooks: Ancient dwarven minecart tracks lead deeper into the mountain
Faint magical wards can be seen stabilizing parts of the tunnel

traps.name: Rockfall
traps.description: A section of the ceiling that collapses when disturbed

features.name: Dwarven Support Beam
features.description: An ancient, rune-covered beam that seems to be holding the tunnel together

dcChecks.description: Navigate through a particularly unstable section without triggering a collapse

locations.name: Ancient Carvings Chamber
locations.description: A large, circular chamber with walls covered in intricate carvings depicting an ancient history. The air feels heavy with lingering magic.

npcs.name: Spectral Historian
npcs.description: The ghostly apparition of an elven lorekeeper, eager to share knowledge

plotHooks: The carvings seem to change subtly when not observed directly
Certain sequences of carvings can be pressed to activate magical effects

features.name: Central Podium
features.description: A stone podium in the center of the room with slots for specific artifacts

dcChecks.description: Decipher the meaning of the ancient carvings

doors.name: Hidden Chamber Entrance
doors.description: A secret door revealed by correctly interpreting the carvings

locations.name: Cultist Ritual Room
locations.description: A sinister chamber with dark altars and eldritch symbols etched into the floor. The air crackles with malevolent energy.
plotHooks: An interrupted ritual has left a portal half-opened
Captives are being prepared for a dark sacrifice

traps.name: Soul Trap
traps.description: A magical circle that drains life force when activated
traps.damage: 3d6 necrotic damage and 1 level of exhaustion

features.name: Profane Altar
features.description: A black stone altar stained with blood, radiating dark energy

dcChecks.description: Identify the dark deity the cultists are worshipping

doors.name: Sanctum Entrance
doors.description: A heavy iron door leading to the inner sanctum

locations.name: Guardian's Hall
locations.description: A grand hall lined with statues of ancient warriors. The air hums with latent magical energy, as if the room itself is watching.
plotHooks: The guardians seem to be protecting something beyond the hall
An ancient trial of worth must be passed to proceed

traps.name: Magical Glyph
traps.description: A hidden glyph that animates nearby statues when triggered
traps.damage: No direct damage, but animates 1d4 Animated Armors

features.name: Trial Pedestal
features.description: A magical pedestal that presents a challenge to prove one's worth

dcChecks.description: Understand the nature of the trial presented by the guardian statues

locations.name: Chasm Crossing
locations.description: A deep, dark chasm splits the cavern. A narrow, crumbling stone bridge spans the gap, with fierce winds howling from the depths.
plotHooks: Echoes from the chasm suggest a hidden path below
The bridge seems to shift and change when not observed directly

traps.name: Crumbling Bridge
traps.description: Sections of the bridge that give way under too much weight
traps.damage: 6d6 bludgeoning damage from falling and potential death

features.name: Updraft Column
features.description: A powerful column of rising air that can lift creatures and objects

dcChecks.description: Maintain balance while crossing the narrow, wind-swept bridge

locations.name: Antechamber
locations.description: A spacious room with ornate pillars and mystical symbols covering the walls. It seems to serve as a final rest before the ultimate challenge.

npcs.name: Ethereal Guide
npcs.description: A translucent, androgynous figure offering cryptic advice

plotHooks: The room offers visions of possible futures
A final riddle must be solved to gain entry to the heart

features.name: Reflection Pool
features.description: A shallow pool that shows visions when gazed into

dcChecks.description: Solve the final riddle to open the way to the Heart of Darkness

doors.name: Heart's Entrance
doors.description: A massive door covered in complex magical seals

locations.name: Heart of Darkness
locations.description: A vast, cathedral-like cavern with a pulsating dark core at its center. Reality seems to warp and twist around the malevolent energy.
plotHooks: The ancient evil is on the verge of awakening
The cave system's stability is tied to the dark core's containment

traps.name: Reality Warp
traps.description: Areas where reality twists, potentially displacing creatures
traps.damage: 4d10 force damage and teleported to a random location in the room

features.name: Dark Core
features.description: The pulsating heart of darkness, source of the cave's corruption

dcChecks.description: Understand how to contain or dispel the dark energy
